Constantly found in Super Paper Mario, shops sell various items which Mario and company can buy. These items can attack enemies, increase stats, or others. They are found across many different dimensions and places. Most of the shops are run by Howzit. The player earns one shop point for every purchase. When a certain amount of shop points is earned, the player receives a free gift. Below is a list detailing the rewards obtained through accruing a certain amount of shop points and how many shop points are required to acquire the certain reward. Upon reaching 300 shop points, the number of shop points is reset to zero.
